children.subject: I believe they'll split the 4 hr video interview into separate interviews, conducted by different interviewers, consecutively.
If you could provide the company's name, it would give us more context. A 4-hour interview on video is almost unheard of.

history.content:
I handed my resume at the EECS Career Fair, expressed interest for an internship and applied for the same. 

Earlier this week, I was contacted to set up a 4 hour video interview for a full-time role at Amazon Lab 126.

Does anyone have tips on preparing for such an interview / what to expect?
history.subject: Interview Process for HW Engineer
